subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Gennady Alyoshin quit as Russia’s deputy sports minister, becoming the second high-ranking official to quit after Russia’s dismal showing at last month’s Winter Olympics in Vancouver.
snippet: Gennady Alyoshin quit as Russia’s deputy sports minister, becoming the second high-ranking official to quit after Russia’s dismal showing at last month’s Winter Olympics in Vancouver.
